title: Monday (13) Special Government Holiday
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Public Administration has declared Monday, 13th June, a Special Government Holiday.
The Ministry said this decision was taken citing transportation issues and difficulties experienced in operating government offices.
However, the holiday should hinder essential services, said the Ministry.
